pages.title: Alignment: Stability
pages.text: <thing>Stability/$ (blue) is one of the basic <thing>alignments/$- the <thing>alignment/$ of a pure <thing>stability/$ beam.$(br2)Pure <thing>stability/$ does nothing, having no effect.$(br2)
<thing>Void-Stability/$ AKA <thing>Chaos/$ will create explosions with a strength=<thing>power/$/4. These explosions will drop all items, similar to TNT explosions.$(br2)
